title: Exodus
description: As their home world is about to explode, the Thundercat Nobles escape. Their engine is damaged so they can't go to their intended destination. While the others enter sleep chambers to survive the long journey, their leader Jaga remains awake to pilot the ship as long as possible since their navigation system is damaged. One they land on Third Earth, the Thundercats must deal with old enemies who have followed them, and face all the challenges that await them on Third Earth.

title: The Unholy Alliance
description: Needing allies, Mumm-ra bends the Mutants to his will. The Mutants go after the Thundercats. In the meantime the Thundercats try to adapt to their new surroundings.

title: Berbils
description: The Thundercats encounter the Berbils, when the Berbils are attacked, the Thundercats defend the Berbils. The Berbils explain that the group who attacked them were ordered to so by some Giantsour. The Thundercats then have to protect the Berbils from the Giantours.

title: The Slaves of Castle Plun-Darr
description: While playing in the forest, Wilykit and Wilykat discover that the mutants have enslaved a slow-minded race of beings as a means of slave labour to construct their own fortress: Castle Plun-Darr.

title: Pumm-Ra
description: Mumm-Ra takes the guise of Pumm-Ra, a Thunderian, to infiltrate and sabotage Cat's Lair.

title: The Terror of Hammerhand
description: Lion-O must defend a herd of unicorns and rescue snarf from the threat posed by a gang of pirate raiders known as the Berserkers.

title: Trouble with Time
description: When Tigra rapidly ages after falling under the deadly enchantment of a place known as the Cave of Time, the Thundercats must figure out how to stop it before it's too late.

title: The Tower of Traps
description: Lion-O and Wilikit must rescue Wilicat from the ultimate fortress.

title: The Garden of Delights
description: While investigating an earthquake, Tigra stumbles upon a magical garden and meets a talking flower named Silky who offers him her fruit. It turns out that she is another one of Mumm-Ra's disguises and the fruit has made Tigra his slave.

title: Mandora: The Evil Chaser
description: Lion-O helps Mandora, an interstellar police officer, retrieve three of the worst criminals in the galaxy after he accidentally releases them.

title: The Ghost Warrior
description: A tomb is accidentally opened, releasing a ghost who used to terrorize Third Earth. The ghost has a special interest in the Thundercats. The Thundercats must figure out who the ghost was in life and his connection to their past.

title: The Doomgaze
description: Mumm-Ra plots to open a time warp prison and release the evil princess Ta-She, who has the deadly power to control all men with her gaze.

title: Lord of the Snows
description: When a meteorite the Thundercats can use to replenish their dwindling energy supply crashes on Hook Mountain, Lion-O must win a duel with the fierce Snowman before they can have it.

title: The Spaceship Beneath the Sands
description: The Mutants convince Mumm-Ra to raise their ship from beneath the desert so that they may build better weapons and vehicles to more effectively battle the Thundercats.

title: The Time Capsule
description: The Thundercats search desperately for a precious device which has all the recorded history of Thundera up until the time of its destruction.

title: The Fireballs of Plun-Darr
description: The Mutants devastate the Cat's Lair, the Warrior Maidens, and much of the surrounding countryside with a powerful long-range fire-cannon they have constructed on Castle Plun-Darr.

title: All That Glitters
description: Mumm-Ra tricks Lion-O into using the Sword of Omens against another Thundercat, causing it to break in half. The only way Liog-O can restore it is to venture into the heart of a volcano.

title: Spitting Image
description: Mumm-Ra switches the real Panthro with a clone infused with the spirit of Hammerhand and sets it free to cause terror and carnage, leaving the Thundercats to take all the blame.

title: Mongor
description: Mongor, a terrible demon that feeds on the power of fear, is accidentally set free from his prison by Wilykit and Wilykat to terrorize Third-Earth.

title: Return to Thundera
description: Lion-O accidentally activates the time capsule, which hurls him back in time to Thundera exactly one day before its destruction. Meanwhile, the Mutants assault Cat's Lair with their most powerful and deadly weapon yet.

title: Dr. Dometone
description: The Thundercats help an undersea professor to protect a machine that prevents the oceans of Third Earth from literally going down the drain.

title: The Astral Prison
description: Jaga is captured by Nemex, an evil being from the Astral world, and Lion-O tries desperately to find a way to rescue his old mentor.

title: The Crystal Queen
description: Lion-O must brave an ice palace to save a sacred bird from a cruel and greedy queen's clutches.

title: Safari Joe
description: The Thundercats must match wits with Safari Joe:the most successful big-game hunter in the galaxy.

title: Snarf Takes Up the Challenge
description: When Mumm-Ra's latest evil scheme succeeds and every single Thundercat is captured, only Snarf is left to save the day.

title: Sixth Sense
description: An alien ship crashes on Third Earth and forms a connection with Cheetara through her sixth sense. Only she can save it when the Mutants attack.

title: The Thunder-Cutter
description: Mumm-Ra tricks Hachiman, a mighty samurai from a distant planet into believing the Thundercats are evil invaders. Hachiman sets out to destroy them.

title: The Wolfrat
description: Vultureman builds a deceptively diminutive infiltration robot and Mumm-Ra arms it with miniaturization gas which shrinks the Thundercats down to size.

title: Feliner: Part One
description: Vultureman summons Rataro and his battleship who kidnaps Snarf's nephew to use as bait to trap the Thundercats.

title: Feliner: Part Two
description: The Thundercats race to try and salvage a part they need for the Feliner before the Mutants attack. Meanwhile, Snarf considers leaving to be with his own kind.

title: Mandora and the Pirates
description: Mandora inspects a space freighter that turns out to be the ship of the evil pirate robot Cracker, and she needs Lion-O's help.

title: Return of the Driller
description: It's a race against time when Mumm-Ra orders Driller to bore a tunnel from an acid lake to the Cat's Lair.

title: Dimension Doom
description: Wizz-Ra, a mighty sorcerer and Mumm-Ra's ancient enemy, emerges after 7000 years of imprisonment in another dimension through a mirror in the Cat's Lair.

title: Queen of 8 Legs
description: Mumm-Ra uses the birth of a powerful spider-queen to his advantage by luring the Thundercats into her deadly web.

title: Sword in a Hole
description: An S.O.S. from deep space turns out to be a trap set by Captain Shiner, a space mercenary working for Mumm-Ra.

title: The Evil Harp of Charr-Nin
description: Wilykit and Wilykat find a magic harp containing a genie named Charr-Nin. Mumm-Ra later offers to free him in exchange for destroying the Thundercats.

title: Lion-O's Anointment First Day: The Trial of Strength
description: Lion-O is the hereditary Lord of the Thundercats. Now he has reached the age where he must prove his worthiness. He must face each of Thundercats in different trials/tests, without the Sword of Omens. First up, Panthro.

title: The Demolisher
description: When the Thundercats face Demolisher, a warrior who battles opponents purely for the sport of it, Lion-O teaches him the true meaning of honor.

title: Monkian's Bargain
description: Monkian goes to Mumm-Ra's pyramid and agrees to give anything if Mumm-Ra will make him powerful enough to defeat the Thundercats.

title: Tight Squeeze
description: After a disagreement, Vultureman leaves castle Plunn-darr and destroys all the mutant's technology. To even the odds, Slithe convinces Mumm-Ra to magically disable all the technology in Cat's lair.

title: The Micrits
description: The Micrits are tiny humanoids, their village keeps getting destroyed when the Thundercats drive their vehicles through the area. The Micrits decide to fight back, and end up taking two hostages.

title: Lion-O's Anointment Second Day: The Trial of Speed
description: Lion-O's trial to become the Thundercat Lord continues. Now he must race against Cheetara. But now the Mutants and Mumm-ra have found out about his trials. They'll stop at nothing to keep Lion-O from succeeding.

title: The Rock Giant
description: When all technology fails, Lion-O must rely on his own cunning and the forces of nature when a seemingly invincible titan is unleashed upon Third Earth.

title: Jackalman's Rebellion
description: The normally submissive Jackalman decides to start his own army in the hopes of conquering Third-Earth himself.

title: Turmagar the Tuska
description: The Thundercats are asked to help the Tuska defend them from the Technopede, an evil robot that is devastating their homeland.

title: Lion-O's Anointment Third Day: The Trial of Cunning
description: Lion-O must now face off against Wily Kat and Wily Kit. It's a race through a cavern, with Wily Kat and Kit, playing tricks on Lion-O. They must also contend with Mutants, and Lion-O meets a race who dwell in the caverns and who don't like people from the outside.

title: The Mumm-Ra Berbil
description: Mumm-Ra disguises himself as an injured Ro-Bear Berbil to infiltrate Cats Lair.

title: Mechanical Plague
description: The Thundercats face a desperate struggle when Mumm-Ra resurrects various powerful mechanical foes they have defeated in the past in his latest scheme to wipe them out.

title: Trapped
description: When a big storm hits Third-Earth, Wilykit and Wilykat are trapped in an old space capsule.

title: Lion-O's Anointment Fourth Day: The Trial of Mind Power
description: Lion-O's faces off against his final Thundercat, Tygra. Tygra can create illusions, he's been conserving his energies for these trials. Can Lion-O tell which danger is real, and which is not? The mutant continue their interference.

title: Excalibur
description: Mumma-ra learns about Excalibur, the greatest sword ever created. He changes into King Arthur, and asks the Lady of the Lake for Excalibur. He meets with the Thundercats, who greet him as a potential ally. Soon "Arthur" challenges Lion-O to a duel, which he foolishly accepts. They will all learn which sword is stronger, the Sword of Omens, or Excalibur.

title: Secret of the Ice King
description: The Thundercats must solve a thousand-year-old mystery if they're to stop the curse of a powerful ice-ogre who assaults Hook Mountain Castle.

title: Good and Ugly
description: Lion-O learns the meaning of not judging by appearance when he is caught up in the conflict between an ugly yet gentle being, and an angelic yet wicked one.

title: The Transfer
description: An unknown ship containing a dangerous radioactive substance approaches Third-Earth and the Mutants and later Mumm-Ra try to use the powerful materials within to destroy the Thundercats.

title: Divide and Conquer
description: Vultureman invents a voice imitator that the Mutants use to deceive, drive apart, and almost conquer the Thundercats.

title: Dream Master
description: Mumm-Ra transforms into the Dream master to invade the dreams and control the minds of the Thundercats.

title: Out of Sight
description: Due to a malfunction with his invisibility whip while rescuing a warrior maiden from the Mutants, Tygra is stuck invisible and needs help fast.

title: The Mountain
description: During mountain climbing, Lion-O is attacked by the Mutants and an avalanche seals them in a cave. Meanwhile, Jackalman steals the sword from Lion-O.

title: The Superpower Potion
description: In his quest to rule Third-Earth, Vultureman invents a potion that makes him powerful enough to defeat the Mutants, Mumm-Ra and even the Thundercats.

title: Eye of the Beholder
description: The Thundercats play a joke on the Mutants by creating a fake Sword of Omens for them to steal, only to have it backfire when they later capture Snarf.

title: Lion-O's Anointment Final Day: The Trial of Evil
description: Lion-O's final test to become the true Lord of the Thundercats. He must defeat his greatest enemy, without the Sword of Omens, and no help from the other Thundercats. He must defeat Mumm-Ra.

title: The Trouble with Thunderkittens
description: Yearning for more respect by the older Thundercats, Wilykit and Wilykat borrow their weapons for practice, only to have them stolen by the Mutants.

title: Mumm-Rana
description: Mumm-Ra meets his exact opposite in Mumm-Rana, a priestess of light. He battles her and manages to take over her mind with dark magic, and then uses her fearsome powers against the Thundercats.

title: The Shifter
description: Vultureman invents a device that can switch one mind with another. He uses it to transfer Snarf's mind into Panthro's body, and vice-versa.

title: Fond Memories
description: Under the guise of Dr Dometome, Mumm-Ra lures Lion-O to a place where he is forced to fight phantoms of foes from the past in an attempt to eliminate the lord of the Thundercats.

title: Mumm-Ra Lives!: Part I
description: Mumm-Ra is weak and faces the threat of three new Thundercats, so he sends the Mutants to release his old enemies the Lunataks from their imprisonment in order to bolster the forces of darkness.

title: Mumm-Ra Lives!: Part II
description: The Mutants succeed in releasing the Lunataks, who immediately begin looting Thundrillium and taking slaves from the local villages, leading to their first run-in with the Thundercats.

title: Mumm-Ra Lives!: Part III
description: The Thundercats build the Tower of Omens to monitor for new and dangerous enemies. Meanwhile, Ma-Mutt, disguised as a Berbil, spies on the Thundercats.

title: Mumm-Ra Lives!: Part IV
description: Mumm-Ra's power is restored, and Snarfer makes it to Third-Earth but crashes in the Lunataks territory, leading the Thundercats to rush to find him before they do.

title: Mumm-Ra Lives!: Part V
description: In searching for the Lunataks flying fortress Sky Tomb, the Thundercats discover that Mumm-Ra is alive again and more powerful than ever before, leading to an epic battle between him and Lion-O.

title: Catfight
description: Mumm-Ra takes the form of Jaga and creates dissent within the ranks of the Thundercats, causing them to fight each other.

title: Psych Out!
description: The Lunatak Alluro uses a powerful talisman on the Thundercats that takes away all their self-confidence, leaving them hopeless and confused.

title: The Mask of Gorgon
description: In his latest evil scheme, Mumm-Ra plans on using the legendary Mask of Gorgon, an artifact which turns all to stone, against the Thundercats.

title: The Mad Bubbler
description: After venturing into a remote cave on Hook Mountain in search of Thundrillium, the Lunataks and later the Thundercats fall victim to a bizarre entity with the power to expand upon the negative influences in a person's soul.

title: Together We Stand
description: Mumm-Ra summons the Berserkers and coats their armour in Thundrainium and sends them to assault the Thundercats at the Tower of Omens.

title: Ravage Island
description: Ravage Island is an island on Third-Earth with a powerful beacon on it that can control minds. Mumm-Ra seeks to use the beacon to make the Thundercats his slaves.

title: Time Switch
description: Thanks to an unfortunate mishap with a time capsule, Lion-O rapidly grows younger and younger. His fellow Thundercats must reverse the process before he ceases to exist.

title: The Sound Stones
description: Vultureman builds a powerful sonic gun with a sound stone he steals from the Lunataks territory of Darkside.

title: Day of the Eclipse
description: The day of the eclipse arrives and any spell Mumm-Ra casts will last until the next eclipse. He casts a spell of decay on the Cats Lair, causing it to fall apart.

title: Sideswipe
description: Chilla freezes Snarfer's spaceship as he heads back to the Tower of Omens. When Mandora gets involved, Chilla freezes her and becomes a fugitive from the law.

title: Mumm-Rana's Belt
description: Luna discovers that her grandmother's magic belt is in the possession of Mumm-Rana and heads straight for the Pyramid of Light to claim the artifact and greatly increase her own power.

title: Hachiman's Honor
description: Luna tricks Hachiman and steals his sword, the Thunder-Cutter, and gives it the Lunataks new samurai robot, the Automaton.

title: Runaways
description: Feeling neglected, Wilykat and Wilykat decide to run away to teach the rest of the Thundercats a lesson. However, thanks to Mumm-Ra, not all goes according to plan.

title: Hair of the Dog
description: When all of the Thundercats except Lion-O are gone, Mumm-Ra switches Snarf with Ma-Mutt, who gives Lion-O poisoned candy fruit.

title: Vultureman's Revenge
description: Vultureman builds a devastating device called the Thundranium projector which Wilykat and Wilykit manage to ruin. In return, he damages their space boards, putting them in major peril.

title: ThunderCats HO! Part 1
description: A nightmare torments Lion-O. He believes that he was saved from his erupting planet as a youngster at the sacrifice of three other Thunderians. Jaga informs the now grown Lion-O that his nightmare is false.

title: ThunderCats - HO! Part 2
description: Lion-O raids the Berserker's ship, but the rescue attempt fails and the captured Thunderians are taken to Fire Rock Mountain after another failed attempt on their part to break free from their captors. Weakened by the Thundrainium, the thunderians are trapped on the mountain.

title: ThunderCats - HO! Part 3
description: On Hook Mountain, Lion-O prepares to battle Monikan in the Fistpounder, when they are caught in an avalanche.

title: ThunderCats - HO! Part 4
description: The sun drains the powers of Mumm-Ra's mummy bandages and Lion-O escapes from their grasp.

title: ThunderCats - HO! Part 5
description: Weakened by the Thunderians pits below, Lion-O hangs from the bridge at Fire Rock Mountain. Hachiman finally realizes that Mumm-Ra tricked him into believing that Lion-O had turned evil.

title: Thundercubs: Part I
description: Mumm-Ra learns of the legendary Treasure of Thundera and the Sword of Plundar, which destroyed Thundera. He and Ma-Mutt travel back in space and time to search the debris of the planet for the sword.

title: Thundercubs: Part II
description: Exploring the newly reformed New Thundera, the Thundercats discover that Mumm-Ra is using all the Snarfs as slave labour to dig for the lost Treasure of Thundera.

title: Thundercubs: Part III
description: Mumm-Ra retrieves the Sword of Plundarr as the Thundercats arrive on New Thundera. While the Thundercats try to retrieve the sword and treasure, Snarf tries to find a way to free his fellow Snarfs.

title: Thundercubs: Part IV
description: The Mutants arrive and Mumm-Ra has them lure the Thundercats to a strange place where, except for Lion-O, they are all transformed into child versions of themselves.

title: Thundercubs: Part V
description: Lion-O frees the child Thundercats from Mumm-Ra's spell, and then confronts him to retrieve the fabled Book of Omens.

title: Totem of Dera
description: Mumm-Ra finds the Treasure of Thundera called the Totem of Dera, which has the power to heal and bring inanimate objects to life, and gives it to Vultureman that he might turn it into a device of destruction to use against the Thundercats.

title: Chain of Loyalty
description: Lion-O learns of the Chain of Loyalty, and Jaga instructs him to retrieve it from New Thundera. But when Mumm-Ra breaks the chain, the Thundercats turn on each other, and Lion-O must find a way to stop them from destroying themselves.

title: Crystal Canyon
description: The Thundercats search a canyon of crystals for one of the Treasures of Thundera known as the Keystone, an item which has the power to heal, but also corrupts and enslaves the unwary.

title: The Telepathy Beam
description: Vultureman uses a new weapon on Cheetara to overwhelm her sixth sense and destroy her belief in herself and block her awareness of greater dangers.

title: Exile Isle
description: The Thundercats capture the Lunataks and exile them to Exile Isle, an asteroid in deep space far from Third Earth. There the villains soon meet up with the Captain Cracker and hatch a plan of escape.

title: Key to Thundera
description: While attempting to decode the Book of Omens Lion-O inadvertently traps himself within it. Mumm-Ra later steals the book, later becoming imprisoned in it himself.

roles.char: Guardian of the Book of Omens

title: Return of the Thundercubs
description: Tygra, Panthro, and Cheetara return to New Thundera to locate more of the Treasure of Thundera, but Mumm-Ra lures them to the mystical Canyons of Youth, which transforms them into children once again.

title: The Formula
description: Alluro's new Superfuel formula for Sky Tomb's engines causes the local plant and animal life to grow to massive proportions. The Lunataks give it to the Mutants, who sprinkle it around Cat's Lair.

title: Locket of Lies
description: The Locket of Lies is a magical object created by Mumm-Ra to appear as a part of the Treasure of Thundera. When opened, the gems inside act as a compass that points the way to the remaining treasure.

title: Bracelet of Power
description: When the Thundercats bring back more of the Treasure of Thundera. Snarf is fascinated by a bracelet and sees that when adorned, it, makes everyone obeys him. Mumm-Ra becomes aware of this, and will stop at nothing to make it his own.

title: The Wild Workout
description: The Lunataks hook up exercise machines to generate Sky Tomb's engines, but their own laziness forces them to kidnap the Thundercats and force them to do the hard work.

title: The Thunderscope
description: Lion-O recovers a mysterious telescope from the wreckage of the original spaceship. Mumm-Ra recognises it as the Thunderscope, which allows its user to locate pieces of the Treasure of Thundera.

title: The Jade Dragon
description: Mumm-Ra discovers the power of one of the pieces of the Treasure of Thundera, the Jade Dragon, which possesses the power to entrap people in its stomach.

title: The Circus Train
description: When an inter-stellar circus train comes to town, the Thundercats seize the opportunity to rid themselves of both the Mutants, and the Lunataks.

title: The Last Day
description: Fed up with Mumm-Ra's failures, the Ancient Spirits of Evil give him one final day to rid Third Earth of the Thundercats.

roles.char: Guardian of the Book of Omens

title: Return to Thundera!: Part I
description: The Thundercats depart Third Earth for New Thundera, leaving Tygra and Pumyra behind to watch over the Cat's Lair and Tower of Omens. Meanwhile, the Ancient Spirits of Evil resurrect Mumm-ra, building a new pyramid on New Thundera.

title: Return to Thundera!: Part II
description: More and more earthquakes are occurring on New Thundera thanks to Mumm-Ra's sabotage of an arcane machine that lies at the center of the planet that holds its gravity together, watched over by the ancient Thunderian sorceress, Jagara.

title: Return to Thundera!: Part III
description: Mumm-Ra sends Ma-Mutt disguised as Mandora to free the Mutants from the Circus Train. The Mutants are then ordered to get rid of Tygra and Pumyra back on Third Earth.

title: Return to Thundera!: Part IV
description: Mumm-Ra sends Ma-Mutt, disguised as Mandora, to free the Mutants from the Circus Train. He then sends them to Third-Earth to eliminate Tygra and Pumyra.

title: Return to Thundera!: Part V
description: Mumm-Ra again seriously threatens to destroy the Gyroscope and thereby the newly reformed New Thundera. Jaga helps Lion-O think of a solution once and for all.

title: Leah
description: The Ancient Spirits of Evil bring a creature to Mumm-Ra called a Mirror Wraith, which he transforms as a doll and gives to a lost thunderian child named Leah, who keeps it and unwittingly puts the Thundercats in great danger.

title: Frogman
description: Wilykit and Wilykat accidentally release Frogman. Seemingly harmless at first, he is soon revealed as a ruthless villain with the fearsome power to control all water.

title: The Heritage
description: While exploring New Thundera, Wilykit and Wilykat stumble upon a mysterious orb of gold and pick it up, believing it to be one of the Treasures of Thundera. However, it soon transpires that that is not the case.

title: Screwloose
description: Jagara cannot work the new Gyroscope alone, so the Thundercats send for someone to aid her. Screwloose, a robot who specializes in the technology, comes to Third Earth. But, Mumm-Ra tampers with his programming, making him destructive.

title: Malcar
description: Mumm-Ra resurrects the ancient alchemist Malcar, but he returns old and weak. Mumm-Ra then sends him to the Canyons of Youth, which will restore his youth and power so that he may effectively defeat the Thundercats.

title: Helpless Laughter
description: Panthro, Snarf, and later even Mumm-Ra fall prey to the waters of the Swamp of the Laughing Lillypads-which unless cured, will cause them to laugh until they die.

title: Cracker's Revenge
description: The twisted robo-pirate Captain Cracker frees the Lunataks from the Circus Train and they all plot to assault Third Earth, since most of the Thundercats are on New Thundera.

title: The Mossland Monster
description: While on a solo trip to New Thndera, Tygra crash lands in an unexplored region of the planet's moss-land. There he is captured by a mysterious and mighty gigantic swamp beast.

title: Ma-Mutt's Confusion
description: Mumm-Ra has a powerful device called the Babylonian Babarian Boiler, that he plans to use against the Thundercats. However, the bumbling Ma-Mutt accidentally destroys the machine, causing an enraged Mumm-Ra to banish him from the pyramid.

title: Shadowmaster
description: The Ancient Spirits of Evil unleash the Shadowmaster, a dark sorcerer who may be even more powerful than Mumm-Ra. Fearing the Sprits will favour the Shadowmaster over him, Mumm-Ra hatches a secret plot to aid his enemies the Thundercats.

title: Swan Song
description: An ecology inspector comes to New Thundera to inspect the new Cat's Lair. His ship uses the Space Way Airborn Navigation system to direct him to planets throughout the universe. Upon arriving he is ambushed by Two-Time, who steals the ship.

title: Touch of Amortus
description: Mumm-Ra reluctantly summons up the treacherous tentacled demon Amortus, who has the formidable ability to turn all living things into stone.

title: The Zaxx Factor
description: Vultureman escapes the Circus Train by hijacking a bookmobile. He discovers information about a powerful enemy of Mumm-Ra, Zaxx. Using this knowledge, Vultureman plots to overthrow Mumm-Ra and rule the universe.

title: Well of Doubt
description: Lion-O unwittingly drinks tainted water from the devastating Well of Doubt, which causes him to lose all his courage and self belief.

title: The Book of Omens
description: The key to the Book of Omens is finally solved and it is unlocked. All of the team must pass different tests to save the planet, and Lion-O faces many trials within the book to prove himself once and for all as Lord of the Thundercats.

roles.char: Guardian of the Book of Omens
